sentences.en: a prison with no proper sanitary facilities
sentences.cn: 一座缺少适当卫生设施的监狱

sentences.en: Diseases were spread through poor sanitary conditions .
sentences.cn: 疾病因卫生条件很差而传播开来。

sentences.en: He worked hard to improve the sanitary conditions of the slums.
sentences.cn: 他努力改进贫民窟的卫生条件.

sentences.en: Hospital operating instruments must be sanitary.
sentences.cn: 医院的手术器械必须是消过毒的.

sentences.en: Information system plays a vital role in public sanitary project.
sentences.cn: 而在公共卫生体系中,信息系统发挥着至关重要的作用.

sentences.en: It's not the most sanitary place one could swim.
sentences.cn: 这个游泳的地方不大卫生。

sentences.en: More refined interpretations of the sanitary quality of water were based upon this knowledge.
sentences.cn: 根据这个道理对水质卫生可作更加精确的解释.

sentences.en: Often, the camps were not very sanitary.
Overcrowding and poor sanitary conditions led to disease in the refugee camps.
sentences.cn: 过度拥挤和恶劣的卫生状况导致难民营中出现疾病。
卫生条件之差令人震惊。

sentences.en: Sanitary conditions had deteriorated to such an extent that there was widespread danger of disease.
sentences.cn: 卫生条件恶化到了如此程度,到处都有发生疾病的危险.

sentences.en: Specialized courses in quantitative analysis, often described as courses in'sanitary Chemistry ".
sentences.cn: 有关定量分析的专门化课程常常在《环境卫生化学 》 课程中讲授.

sentences.en: The crew does not exercise sanitary techniques.
sentences.cn: 工作人员不采用卫生措施.

sentences.en: The curve - edged hobbing cutter is used in producing rectangular wing sanitary napkin.
sentences.cn: 曲线刃滚切刀是用来加工护翼卫生巾的专用刀具.

sentences.en: The Sanitary Board tries to stamp out the epidemic.
sentences.cn: 卫生局试图消灭这种流行病.

sentences.en: The sanitary conditions in this restaurant are abominable.
sentences.cn: 这家饭馆的卫生状况糟透了.

sentences.en: There was a small and not very sanitary inn nearby.
sentences.cn: 附近有一家不那么卫生的小客栈.

sentences.en: Your food, water, and sanitary facilities are acutely substandard.
sentences.cn: 你们的食物, 水和卫生设备都比一般标准低得多.

words.tran_cn: [医] 环境卫生；卫生设备；下水道设施
使合卫生；装设卫生设备
采取卫生措施使其安全；给…消毒（等于sanitize）
使…无害；给…消毒；对…采取卫生措施

phrases.tran_cn: 洁具，卫生设施；卫生设备配件
卫生标准（sanitary standard的复数形式）
月经垫；卫生巾（等于sanitary napkin）

trans.tran_en: relating to the ways that dirt, infection, and waste are removed, so that places are clean and healthy for people to live in
